bug.author: brollb
bug.summary: Invalid branch name when importing library
bug.description: The plugin is generating invalid branch names in the event of a collision. It is unlikely that this occurs unless the library import fails and does not clear the temporary branch. <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/4982789/76645252-9c14e880-6526-11ea-8c9b-aab388887c26.png></denchmark-link>
